title: This has gone to far!!!!
body:
okay so i queue up for ranked i wait for 10 minutes but this isn't about queue times no this is a much bigger problem so i find a match at last i pick my pref bans go though i lock in then boom game crashes . so as u do at this point i rushed to re-log i logged in went to reconnect and well team used /remake i get outta the loading screen get the pop up the game is no longer running blah blah blah i get back to client and boom you have been placed in low queue for 5 match made games now tbh you guys need to re-think this whole LPQ system cos its kind of starting to get buggy and un-fair i didnt intent disconnect which means i dont deserve the queues as it was due to a game bug cant be my pc i just got a new one last week . Now i got the queues on my old pc for the same reason game crashed team /remake i was doing my queues i ended up sitting in 7 20 minute queues cos every time i got into a lobby for the first 2 games it crashed again.

Now i know riot wont remove the queues but like legit it kinda isn't fair if it was a game bug that crashed you then you shouldn't be blamed and given queues there up to 20 minutes now and every time ive got them has been from a game bug first it was the black screen bug then it was the can't reconnect bug and now this shit

And also for finishing the 5 queues it takes about 5 hours 20 minutes then queue times games normally go around 20 minutes these days which is kinda bullshit

legit plz i want to speak to a real rioter about this its gone to far

if anyone else gets random crashes in champion select plz if you know how to fix it plz plz im sick of 5 hours of sitting its kind of past a joke now

replies.body:
ISP disconnections and computer crashes do happen and Riot understand that, so punishments aren't often dished out after one leave. However,  AFK for ranked which is[ treated far more severely than the other modes.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q2)

Leaver buster is an automated system and can't tell the difference between an intentional and unintentional disconnections (hence why you don't usually get punished after one leave).

 It does however kick in after 5mins of afk because even the shortest period of DC can make or break a game and is enough to negatively impact on the other 9 players. We also have /remake now, so that if the dc occurs during champ select or loading screen (because sometimes games go through even when you dc in champ select), you team wont have to play awkwardly through until the late player catches up if they do connect. 

If you are having trouble with you client crashing during champ select, please check out some of the [following help pages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)

If all else fails, please send in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and explain the crashes and see if one of the support staff can help you. Please keep in mind that they will not take you out of low priority queue. 
Also please keep in mind that it may take a lil while for them to answer your question (up to 72 hours), but please do not send more than one ticket/add more info to your ticket as you wait in as it will push your enquiry to the back of the queue and you will have to wait longer.
